full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1501419300945{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column color_style="light" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1501421411489{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-right: 12% !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;padding-left: 12% !important;background-image: url(http://pixel8es.com/wpthemes/rigel/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2017/06/CA-Slider-Bg-cropped.jpg?id=2434) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][icon_box title="Our Vision" title_font="{'family':'Titillium Web', 'variant':'600', 'size':'21px'}" content_font="{'family':'Raleway', 'variant':'regular', 'size':'15px'}" button_link="url:%23|||" align="text-left"]The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators.[/icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column color_style="light" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1501421420571{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-right: 12% !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;padding-left: 12% !important;background-color: #151515 !important;}"][icon_box title="Our Value" title_font="{'family':'Titillium Web', 'variant':'600', 'size':'21px'}" content_font="{'family':'Raleway', 'variant':'regular', 'size':'15px'}" button_link="url:%23|||" button_size="md" align="text-left"]The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental; in fact, it will be Occidental. To an English person, it will seem like simplified English[/icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1501411091053{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-right: 12% !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;padding-left: 12% !important;background-color: #efefef !important;}"][icon_box title="Our Mission" title_font="{'family':'Titillium Web', 'variant':'600', 'size':'21px'}" content_font="{'family':'Raleway', 'variant':'regular', 'size':'15px'}" button_link="url:%23|||" align="text-left"]To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words. If several languages coalesce, the grammar of the language is regular than that of the individual languages.[/icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1501411510062{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1484234232770{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner css=".vc_custom_1484222644509{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][title title="Our Latest Projects" align="center" title_font="{'family':'Titillium Web', 'variant':'600', 'size':'32px'}" sub_title_font="{'family':'Raleway', 'variant':'regular', 'size':'15px'}" title_uppercase="no" font_size="custom-sz" title_margin="0px 0px 25px 0px" sub_title_text="Collaboratively grow synergistic products vis-a-vis visionary infomediaries.
